name: Hangman Platformer
description:
This game was created for the Stay Safe Jam, where the theme was solidarity. 

You have to be patient with the little green balls, they will give you the ability to reveal letters at the end of the game, where you enter the Hangman part of the game. 

You can move by arrow, and jump by Space. Don't forget, there is a double jump! And wait for the green fellows!
